Title: Cigarettes and Alcohol and Rollerblading
Plot: Ted and co. enter a giving-things-up-for-Lent contest and soon discover that abstinence is easier preached than done. Father Jack sobers up for the first time in years, but Dougal and Ted find their resolve wavering. To strengthen their vows Ted calls in a nun to supervise them. She turns out to be a sadist of the first water, and the results are inevitable.
GuestStars: Rosemary Henderson, Maurice O'Donoghue, Nuala Walsh, Irene Warren, Don Wycherley, Chris Curran
